summary: Build a web page styled to resemble the Kavurey Hospital website.

existing_features.title: Restyle the overall site visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) to resemble a modern hospital website similar to the Kavurey Hospital website, while keeping the existing pages and content structure intact.

Update the global header and footer presentation to match the Kavurey Hospital-like styling (e.g., cleaner navigation styling, improved spacing, and more prominent primary call-to-action), while preserving existing navigation items and links.

Redesign the Home page layout and section styling to look closer to the Kavurey Hospital website style (hero section, emergency highlight, service highlights, trust signals, and CTA), without removing existing sections or changing their meaning.

Adjust Tailwind theme tokens and global styles (e.g., in the CSS variables theme) as needed to support the new Kavurey Hospital-like palette and typography, ensuring consistent styling across light and dark modes (if dark mode remains enabled).

new_feature_requests.summary: Restyle the current page to look like the Kavurey Hospital website (layout, colors, typography, overall design).

projectName: Restyle the homepage to match a Kavurey Hospital-like website design
